nodes.text: Many years before 2000 BBY, the Sith Lord Darth Phobos was defeated by a joint force of Jedi and Sith.

The Jedi and Sith recognized Phobos and her cult as a threat to both factions, so they reluctantly joined forces against the cult in an attempt to stop the Theelin Sith. The battle ended in a Jedi/Sith victory, with Darth Phobos defeated. Her cult perpetuated for many years, only to become extinct by the time of the Fourth Great Schism in 2000 BBY.
Despite Phobos' supposed death, rumors of her survival continued for centuries, becoming a legend within the Jedi Order.
